name: Kanti Automatic Systems
overview:
Established in the year 2007, at Delhi (India), we “Kanti Automatic Systems”, are one of the leading names engaged in manufacturing, trading and supplying a qualitative assortment of Aircraft Hangar Doors, Residential & Commercial Doors, Commercial & Household Gates, Retractable Gates, Fire & Metal Doors, Boom Barriers, Bollards.

Vendor Base: We have developed healthy and sustainable business relations with some of the most reliable vendors of the Industry as far as quality, knowhow and experience and commitment is concerned. Our vendors are chosen after comprehensive investigation about their market status, financial stability, capability to meet large orders and past records of accomplishment. This strategy also ensures that our products are in conformity with international standards.

Our Quality: We are a quality conscious organization, therefore quality for us is always Top Priority. Our prime motive is to deliver only those products to our customers that conform to the set industry quality standards/parameters. For manufacturing these products, we ensure that our vendors uses high-grade raw material and follows the set norms for production.

Why Us?: International quality standard range Well equipped manufacturing facility Expert team of engineers, industrial designers and other supporting staff Customized packaging Competitive prices

Our Team: Technocrat • Management and Coordination • Quality control • Storekeeper • Sales & marketing executives
